Text: Wonderful film. One of my favorites of the french new wave. Its strange when watching this in a film class I think I was the only person who loved this movie. I can get why some dont like it but its so mesmerizing. Thanks for all the great movies!
Muchas gracias, ya era hora de que sacaran esta gran pelĂ­cula en esta calidad
Doesn't work on WDTV Live - player freezes and has to be rebboted. Probably problem with header compression. Works with VLC on PC and Mac.

If using external player like WDTV or mediagate,
simply remux the file with mkvmerge http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/

Make sure the compression is set to "none" in extra options.
